page.title: 21Mobile Age
page.content:
Now all households will have a TV more increasingly becoming High Definition (HD). The vast majority of properties will also have a desktop computer and/or a laptop if not several. DVDs and BluRays have come to replace Videos. Game Consols are owned by most children/young adults including Playstation, xbox and Nintendo Wii. Almost everyone (with the exception of the older generation - 60+) own a mobile phone, most of which incorporate camera's and increasingly internet on smart phones. Popular makes being iphone, blackberry and HTC. With many other brands provided by many networks being available. Ipod and MP3's are main mediums used for listening to music. Tablets are just coming onto the market.
J Balchin
